paragraphs.text: %md # Online learning and time-aware evaluation in Alpenglow

msg.data: Online learning and time-aware evaluation in Alpenglow

paragraphs.title: Load the required Python packages including Alpenglow, Pandas, Numpy and Matplotlib
paragraphs.text:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import alpenglow as ag
import alpenglow.experiments
import alpenglow.evaluation
import alpenglow.utils

paragraphs.title: Loading Seaborn is only for plot styling
paragraphs.text:
import seaborn as sns
sns.set(font="Droid Sans",font_scale = 1.5)
sns.set_style("white")
sns.set_color_codes("dark")

paragraphs.title: Read the Tutorial sample dataset
paragraphs.text:
folder = "."
data = pd.read_csv(folder + "/data",names=["time","user","item"],sep=" ")

paragraphs.title: Exploring the data
paragraphs.text:
beginTime = data["time"][0]
week = 604800
activity = data.groupby((data['time']-beginTime)//week)['user'].count()

plt.plot(activity,"o-")
plt.grid()
plt.xlabel("time (weeks)")
plt.ylabel("number of records per week")
plt.ylim(0,20000)
%md ### **Setting up the experiment: learn over 10 weeks, online evaluate between weeks 10 and 15**

msg.data: Setting up the experiment: learn over 10 weeks, online evaluate between weeks 10 and 15

paragraphs.text:
numberOfWeeks = 15
beginEvalWeek = 10
endTime = beginTime + int(week * numberOfWeeks)
train = data[data["time"] <= endTime]
train["eval"] = train.apply(lambda x: 1 if x['time'] > beginTime + beginEvalWeek * week else 0,axis=1)

paragraphs.title: Your first Alpenglow experiment: a simple popularity recommender
paragraphs.text:
online_pop_experiment = alpenglow.experiments.PopularityExperiment()
pop_ranks = online_pop_experiment.run(train, verbose=False)

paragraphs.title: The returned  dataframe contains the predicted scores and ranks
paragraphs.text: pop_ranks

paragraphs.title: Computing pointwise DCG and then weekly average DCG scores
paragraphs.text:
pop_ranks['dcg']=alpenglow.evaluation.DcgScore(pop_ranks)
pop_average_dcg = pop_ranks.groupby((pop_ranks['time']-beginTime)//week)['dcg'].mean()

paragraphs.title: Tracking the performance between weeks 20 and 30
paragraphs.text:
plt.plot(pop_average_dcg,"o-")
plt.xlabel("time (weeks)")
plt.ylabel("average weekly DCG")
plt.grid()
plt.ylim(0,0.04)

paragraphs.title: Online factorization experiment
paragraphs.text:
online_mf_experiment = alpenglow.experiments.FactorExperiment(learning_rate=0.2,negative_rate=99)
factor_ranks = online_mf_experiment.run(train, verbose=False)

factor_ranks['dcg'] = ag.evaluation.DcgScore(factor_ranks)
factor_average_dcg = factor_ranks.groupby((factor_ranks['time']-beginTime)//week)['dcg'].mean()

paragraphs.title: Comparing the results of the popularity and factorization models
paragraphs.text:
plt.plot(pop_average_dcg,"o-", label="popularity")
plt.plot(factor_average_dcg, "o-", label="factorization")
plt.legend()
plt.grid()
plt.ylim(0,0.04)
%md ### **Setting up a periodic batch model**

msg.data: Setting up a periodic batch model

paragraphs.title: Setting up a periodic batch model
paragraphs.text:
batch_mf_experiment = alpenglow.experiments.BatchFactorExperiment(
    negative_rate=19,
    period_length=week,
    learning_rate=0.05,
    number_of_iterations=4,
)
batch_mf_ranks = batch_mf_experiment.run(train, verbose=False)

batch_mf_ranks['dcg']=alpenglow.evaluation.DcgScore(batch_mf_ranks)
batch_mf_average_dcg = batch_mf_ranks.groupby((batch_mf_ranks['time']-beginTime)//week)['dcg'].mean()

paragraphs.title: Comparing the performance of the above 3 models
paragraphs.text:
plt.plot(pop_average_dcg,"o-", label="popularity")
plt.plot(factor_average_dcg, "o-", label="factorization")
plt.plot(batch_mf_average_dcg, "o-", label="batch factorization")
plt.legend()
plt.grid()
plt.ylim(0,0.04)
%md ### **Setting up a Batch&Online model**

msg.data: Setting up a Batch&Online model

paragraphs.title: Batch then online experiment
paragraphs.text:
batch_and_online_experiment = alpenglow.experiments.BatchAndOnlineFactorExperiment(
    batch_negative_rate=19,
    period_length=week,
    batch_learning_rate=0.07,
    online_negative_rate=99,
    online_learning_rate=0.2,
    number_of_iterations=4,
)
batch_and_online_ranks = batch_and_online_experiment.run(train, verbose=False)

batch_and_online_ranks['dcg']=alpenglow.evaluation.DcgScore(batch_and_online_ranks)
batch_and_online_average_dcg = batch_and_online_ranks.groupby((batch_and_online_ranks['time']-beginTime)//week)['dcg'].mean()

paragraphs.title: Comparing all models
paragraphs.text:
plt.plot(pop_average_dcg,"o-", label="popularity")
plt.plot(factor_average_dcg, "o-", label="online mf")
plt.plot(batch_mf_average_dcg, "o-", label="periodic batch mf")
plt.plot(batch_and_online_average_dcg, "o-", label="batch then  online mf")
plt.legend()
plt.ylim(0,0.04)
plt.grid()

paragraphs.title: Parameter Search using Alpenglow's built-in utility
paragraphs.text:
mf_parameter_search = alpenglow.utils.ThreadedParameterSearch(online_mf_experiment, alpenglow.evaluation.DcgScore, threads=4)
mf_parameter_search.set_parameter_values('negative_rate', np.linspace(10, 100, 4))
neg_rate_scores = mf_parameter_search.run(train, verbose=False)

plt.plot(neg_rate_scores["negative_rate"],neg_rate_scores["DcgScore"],"o-")
plt.grid()
plt.xlabel("negative rate")
plt.ylabel("average DCG")
